# default

**Type Property**

An instance of the default Shazam library.

## Declaration

```swift
static let `default`: SHLibrary
```

## Managing the items in the library

- **addItems(_:)**: Adds an array of media items to the user’s Shazam library.
- **removeItems(_:)**: Removes an array of media items from the user’s Shazam library.
- **items**: The list of synced items in the Media Library.

items.description: Adds an array of media items to the user’s Shazam library.
items.name: addItems(_:)

items.description: Removes an array of media items from the user’s Shazam library.
